text: Alan Peacock (born 29 October 1937) is an English former footballer. He spent the majority of his career at Middlesbrough, also playing for Leeds United and Plymouth Argyle. He joined Middlesbrough in 1954. Peacock's high scoring rate earned him a place in the 1962 World Cup England squad. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: Alan Peacock
